SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Set Up Einstein Personalization User Permission Sets

Create a user permission sets with the appropriate Einstein Personalization permissions.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create permission sets:	Manage Profiles and Permission Sets
To assign permission sets:	

Assign Permission Sets

View Setup and Configuration

In Setup, search for and select Permission Sets.
Click New, and name the permission set.
For example, name it Personalization Admin.
For License, select Personalization, and click Save.
Under Apps, click Object Settings.
Grant Read and View All permissions for these Data Cloud objects.
Data Graph Definitions
Data Model Objects
Data Model Taxonomies
Data Object Categories
Data Space Definitions
Data Spaces
Grant Read, Create, Edit, Delete, and View All permissions for these Einstein Personalization objects.
Personalization Point Definitions
Personalization Schema Definitions
Personalization Recommender Definitions
Grant access to the Einstein Personalization platform.
On the Permission Set Overview page, under System, select System Permissions.
Enable Access Personalization Platform.
(Optional) To let users configure and access the Personalization Intelligence Dashboard, enable Personalization Intelligence User. See Personalization Analytics.
Save your changes.
In Setup, search for and select Permission Sets.
Select Data Cloud Salesforce Connector, and under Apps, click Object Settings.
Grant Read and View All permissions for these Data Cloud objects.
Data Graph Definitions
Data Model Objects
Data Spaces
Grant Read and View All permissions for these Einstein Personalization objects.
Personalization Point Definitions
Personalization Schema Definitions
Personalization Recommender Definitions
Grant access to the Einstein Personalization platform.
On the Permission Set Overview page, under System, select System Permissions.
Enable Access Personalization Platform.
Save your changes.

Assign the permission sets to users using Manage Permission Set Assignments.
